name: Nike Air Max 270
details: The Nike Air Max 270 offers plush cushioning and a modern look with a large Air Max unit in the heel for maximum comfort.

name: Adidas Ultraboost 22
details: The Adidas Ultraboost 22 provides a responsive and cushioned feel with a Primeknit upper and Boost technology for all-day comfort.

name: Puma RS-X3 Puzzle
details: The Puma RS-X3 Puzzle features a bold design with a mix of materials and vibrant colorways, offering both style and comfort.

name: New Balance 990v5
details: The New Balance 990v5 is an iconic sneaker known for its superior cushioning and support, featuring a premium suede and mesh upper.
